recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef, onions, and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Combine with spaghetti.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Simmer in tomato sauce and cream.

recipes.name: Sushi Rolls
recipes.instructions: Prepare sushi rice. Lay seaweed, add rice, fish, and avocado. Roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce.
